headline: Next-gen procurement platform Levelpath nabs $55M
summary: The investment signals confidence in Levelpath's fast growth and its potential to disrupt a market dominated by legacy players.

raw.headline: Next-gen procurement platform Levelpath nabs $55M

headline: Order.co Names Larry Robinett to Lead Partnerships and Drive Adoption of Its Workday Built Procurement Integration
summary: Order.co welcomes Larry Robinett as Head of Workday Accounts & Alliances to help drive adoption of its Workday-built integrated search experience for procurement.NEW YORK, June 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Order.co, the world’s leading B2B Ecommerce Platform, welcomes Larry Robinett as Head of Workday Accounts & Alliances. Robinett joins the company to expand strategic partnerships and scale adoption of Order.co’s exclusive Workday Built integration. Robinett brings more than two decades of expe
